channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: They're Breaking Every Retirement Rule to Be Off Now, Not Later
item.description: Some workers want to spread retirement throughout their careers, even if it means a smaller 401(k).

item.title: GitLab share price target raised by BofA on strong quarter
Fears of Economic Slowdown Spark Stock-Market Selloff
item.description: The Dow industrials slid more than 600 points and the Nasdaq Composite shed 3.3%.

item.title: Altair Engineering director sells shares worth over $55,000
In Retirement, There's Finally Time to Cherish the Past
item.description: A trip to a childhood home. Boxes of old letters. A storage room filled with artificats from long ago. The memories they evoke have never felt so dear...

item.title: Sweetgreen stock upgraded on promising long-term growth outlook
China Needs More Factory Robots. Can It Build Its Own?
item.description: Local production of industrial robots is rising, but Japanese and European makers still have a role.

item.title: As China, U.S. climate envoys meet, presidential election casts shadow
Americans Are Really, Really Bullish on Stocks

item.title: BofA cuts PagerDuty stock target, maintains Buy rating
